Html:
Hi,

our Team currently switched from MVVM Light 4.1.24 (msi) to MVVM Light 4.1.27 (NuGet).
Since this update we can't sign our assemblys with Strong Name, because the referenced MVVM Light assemblys doesn't have a strong Name.
Do we have to sign the MVVM Light dlls by ourseleves, or is there another solution?

Thanks,
Darius
